issue.title: [C++] Pass -C option when compiling with ccache to avoid some warnings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3985](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3985). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ccache by default will eat comments, some of which are used by gcc to disable certain warnings, like case statements that fall through.

see https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/3004
